Execution Guidelines
- Track progress through this checklist and update after each step.

Communication Rules
- Keep explanations concise, avoid unnecessary command output, and mention if steps are skipped.

Development Rules
- Use the project root (`.`) for commands, avoid unrequested media, and apply additional rules from project setup when provided.

Folder Creation Rules
- Stay within the current workspace root and avoid creating new folders unless required (besides `.vscode` for tasks).

Extension Installation Rules
- Install only the extensions explicitly requested via setup tools.

Project Content Rules
- Implement only requested features, avoid speculative integrations, and call out placeholders when used.

Task Completion Rules
- Consider the work complete when the project builds cleanly, documentation is current, and launch instructions are provided to the user.
